summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Sections 24.16.050, 24.40.010, 24.40.020, 24.40.050, 24.40.060, 24.42.010, 24.42.020, 24.42.050 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Zoning Ordinance 86300), Sections 6.3, 14.1, 14.2, 14.4, 14.5, 14A.1, 14A.2 and 14A.4 as they relate to garbage and rubbish containers and the collection, storage and processing of secondhand goods and recyclable materials.
